caption.title: Changes in gene expression and biologic pathways affected following subclinical or acute HEV infection in the pregnant women in 3rd trimester with reference to non-pregnant controls.
caption.p: Differential expression analysis in PBMCs from pregnant subclinical (PR-3-SC) and acute (PR-3-acute) patients as compared to healthy non-pregnant controls (NPR-control). (A) DAVID was used to identify over-represented Gene Ontology (GO) terms. Significant enriched GO terms of differentially expressed up-regulated genes in PR-3-SC and PR-3-acute patients. The vertical axis is the GO category and the horizontal axis is–log P value <0.05.(B)The enriched KEGG pathways of differentially expressed up-regulated genes in PR-3-SC and PR-3-acute patients (P value <0.05).(P value is modified Fisher’s Exact test P- value or EASE score).
